desc.p: In this exercise we set up our own DNS Server on the provided Virtual Machines.

section.title: Prerequisite
section.p: We have two Virtual Servers with the IP addresses
We can access both from our own local machines using ssh.

section.title: Installing Bind
section.p: First of all we need to install bind9, the software we will use to provide the DNS service.
For adjusting the server's log level we edit the /etc/bind/named.conf.local

To turn off IPv6, we need to create the file /etc/init.d/bind9 containing the following lineOPTIONS="-4 -u bind"
